name: Premium Sudoku Cards
description:
Play Sudoku the way it was meant to be played! Premium Sudoku Cards offers the highest quality, Single-Solution, authentic Sudoku cards available.

Sudoku is one of the most loved puzzle games of all time. Experience it now with helpful solving tools, a simple and frustration-free design, statistics, and more!

Features:
• Single-Solution cards of the highest quality.
• Simple, easy to use design.
• Notes
• Hint
• Undo
• Stats
• Incorrect/same digit highlighting and more!

Premium Sudoku Cards is free to play, but offers In-App Purchases and subscriptions to unlock additional difficulties and more cards.

Download now and win a game every day.

You can follow the instructions on our website to change or cancel your subscription:
http://www.timosstudios.com/how-to-cancel-subscription-on-ios

This app contains Auto-Renewable Subscriptions that provides access to additional cards:
• 1 month Duration
• Silver, Gold, and Platinum Membership subscriptions offered
• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the stated duration) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Account Settings in iTunes after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
• Privacy policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/905866
• Terms of use: http://www.timosstudios.com/terms-of-use
